Welcome to my website.

Let me use this opportunity to quickly introduce myself to you.

Hi, I'm Diana Dai, a freelance web developer.

In my spare time, I love traveling the world. And currently, I’m living in the beautiful city Melbourne.

My working time is dedicated to creating a professional “online image” for small business owners. Doing so, I use a very unique approach…

Here’s the story behind it:

Using usual website builders at first, I was never truly satisfied with the performance of websites built by WordPress & co.

On top of that, it just wasn’t a good experience to work with them - It just wasn’t fun for me.

So about two years ago I decided to jump off from them… And taught meyself to code every line “from scratch”.

And let me tell you this - I couldn’t be more proud about the results my clients get today.

Want to see why?

  • "Hand-coded" websites do not just reach the official benchmark of 2 seconds loading speed… they absolutely crush it. (0.5 seconds is NO challenge!). Makes both your customer as well as Google's algorithm happy.

  • If a "handwritten” code powers your website, maintenance is (almost) non-existent.

  • Small business owners don’t need to fear cyber attacks, right? Sorry, but the truth needs to be told: An article by Microsoft reveals - 43% of all cyber-attacks target small businesses! The solution? Combining my websites with a "CDN" - and you never need to worry about any hacker.

  • Usage of the secret "Mobile-First Indexing" trick, that’ll force the algorithm to push your Google ranking up. (Hint: Website builders deny you to do this.)

  • And much, much more…


Want to learn more? Contact me today!
